articles.title: Bigg Boss OTT 3 winner is Sana Makbul; Naezy and Ranvir Shorey to emerge as runners-up in Anil Kapoor show: IE poll - The Indian Express
articles.description: Bigg Boss OTT 3 grand finale: The winner of third season of Bigg Boss is Sana Makbul, with Naezy and Ranvir Shorey as runners-up, as per an Indian Express poll. Read all the details here.
articles.content: Bigg Boss OTT Season 3 winner is Sana Makbul, with Naezy and Ranvir Shorey as runners-up, as per an Indian Express poll. Bigg Boss OTT 3 will host its finale on Friday night with Sana, Ranvir, Naezy,… [+2132 chars]
